response.overview: Zhen-hong, a man without resident registration, accompanied by his sister Mila’s ashes, returns to Pontianak, Indonesia. His reasons are twofold: to fulfill his sister’s final wish and to search for CHEN Ming-tai, their estranged Chinese father who abandoned them years ago. Jia-min’s aunt, Yu-lan, happens to witness Mila’s tragic death and is immediately possessed by an evil spirit, and collapses to the ground. Jia-min, along with her possessed aunt, seeks help from Master Xi. They discover that Yu-lan is missing one of her three souls and seven spirits, a condition that can only be resolved by finding the source of the matter. Thus, they embark on a journey to Indonesia together. As bizarre occurrences occur around them, they gradually realize these events are connected to the local legend of “Kuntilanak.” What kind of curses have befallen them, and what challenges must they confront to resolve the crisis this time?
response.title: The Rope Curse 4
